name: European Kidney Health Alliance
membership:
EKHA is a member of ECDA, the European Chronic Disease Alliance: http://www.alliancechronicdiseases.org/home/ 
It is currently holding the Presidency of the Alliance until the end of 2020.
goal:
Raise awareness of the importance of kidney health and the growing prevalence and societal burden of CKD
Influence strategies for early detection and prevention
Promote harmonised standards of care throughout Europe
Influence future EU research priorities and secure funding for innovation in care
Cooperate with other key stakeholders in the chronic disease arena
Facilitate exchange of information and provide expertise to the EU policy makers
interests: Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport
euInitiatives:
-EU chronic disease framework
-Developments in Organ donation and transplantation legislation
-Developments on food labelling, food marketing
-Food Reformulation
-Developments on health promotion and disease prevention
-EU Health & Research programmes
